special_powers.name: UPGRADED ARMOR
special_powers.description: Modify Iron Man Mk 7's speed and attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: AERIAL ASSAULT
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 7 can use the Move and Attack ability.

special_powers.name: BRINGING THE PARTY TO YOU
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 7 can use Perplex. When Iron Man Mk 7 targets an opposing character with Perplex, he can also use Outwit until your next turn, but only to counter a power on the same character.

special_powers.name: TOP OF THE LINE, AMERICAN MADE!
special_powers.description: Opposing characters with the Armor or Robot keyword modify their attack value by -1 when attacking Iron Man Mk 42.

special_powers.name: JARVIS, IDENTIFY HOSTILES
special_powers.description: When Iron Man Mk 42 makes a ranged combat attack and misses by 1, after actions resolve, he may make a ranged combat attack as a free action. This ranged combat attack can't be against an opposing character Iron Man Mk 42 has targeted this turn and his attack value is modified by -2 for this attack.

special_powers.name: SELF-REPAIRING ARMOR
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 42 can use Invulnerability and Regeneration.

special_powers.name: BODYGUARD
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game choose a friendly character with the Celebrity, Politician, or Ruler keyword. When that character is adjacent to Iron Patriot, it can use Super Senses and on a result of 3-4, the damage from the attack is dealt to Iron Patriot instead.

special_powers.name: ALWAYS ON DUTY
special_powers.description: Iron Patriot can use Combat Reflexes and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: TERRORIST MASTERMIND
special_powers.description: When Mandarin occupies his starting area, opposing characters can't draw a line of fire to him.

special_powers.name: ACTIVATE THE SLEEPER CELLS
special_powers.description: If Mandarin is in his starting area, he can draw lines of fire and count range and squares from the square of any single friendly charracter with A.I.M. keyword that has been given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: MESSAGE OF TERROR
special_powers.description: Mandarin can use Leadership, Outwit, and Perplex. If Mandarin occupies his starting area and a friendly character has been KO'd by the Extremis Explosion power this turn, when Mandarin uses Outwit or Perplex, he may target opposing characters anywhere on the battlefield.

special_powers.name: JUST ANOTHER DAY...
special_powers.description: Extremis Soldier can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: UPGRADED ARMOR
special_powers.description: When Tony Stark hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve, place a promotion token on his character card.  You may then roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and add 1 for each promotion token on his character card; on a result of 8 or higher, you may replace this character with any character with this trait and a point value of 75 or less the same number of clix from its starting line.

special_powers.name: IT'S ABOUT LEGACY
special_powers.description: Tony Stark can use Enhancement and Outwit.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS INJECTION TAKING HOLD
special_powers.description: Pepper Potts can use Invulnerability. When turning the dial, if this click is revealed due to damage taken from a opponent's attack, stop turning the dial.

special_powers.name: BIO-BLASTS
special_powers.description: Pepper Potts has a range value of 6. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: FATHER OF EXTREMIS
special_powers.description: Friendly characters using the Extremis Explosion power affect characters and terrain within 7 squares instead of 5.

special_powers.name: A NEW WORLD IS DAWNING
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 8 squares can't use Additional Team Abilities.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS TREATMENT
special_powers.description: Aldrich Killian can use Support. When he does, a character healed through this use of Support modifies its attack and damage values by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: UNI-BEAM
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man Mk 17 a ranged combat action targeting all characters in range and line of fire along a straight, horizontal, or vertical path, ignoring characters for line of fire purposes. The ranged combat attack is made against all characters along the chosen path. Beginning with the closest character, deal damage equal to Iron Man Mk 17's damage value minus the number of characters previously hit, minimum 1.

special_powers.name: STEALTH ARMOR
special_powers.description: Any character that is not within 4 squares can't draw a line of fire to Iron Man Mk 15. When he has one or more action tokens, Iron Man Mk 15 can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: SENSORY DEPRIVATION GLOBE
special_powers.description: When Iron Man Mk 15's attack total is at least 2 greater than his target's defense value, that character can't draw a line of fire beyond 2 squares until your next turn.

special_powers.name: JUST ANOTHER DAY...
special_powers.description: Brandt can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: COVER EACH OTHER
special_powers.description: If a friendly with the Soldier keyword within 4 squares occupies or is adjacent to a square of hindering or blocking terriain, all friendly characters with the Soldier keyword within 6 squares of Brandt modify their defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: CORPORAL PUNISHMENT
special_powers.description: Brandt can use Probability Control, but can only affect rolls of friendly characters with Soldier keyword. When she does and the attack misses all targets, deal the attacking character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: USEFUL, TO A POINT
special_powers.description: When Extremis Brute is within 8 squares and line of fire to a higher point friendly character with the A.I.M. keyword, Extremis Brute can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS EXPLOSION
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed stop turning the dial. At the beginning of your turn deal Extremis Brute 1 unavoidable damage and deal 3 damage to each character and destroy each object, wall, and square of blocking terrain within 5 squares.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS HEAT
special_powers.description: Extremis Brute can use Poison. Adjacent opposing character that take no damage from this use of Poison put a Heat token on their character card. A character with 1 or more Heat tokens can't use Toughness. A character with 2 or more Heat tokens can't use Invulnerability. A character with 3 or more Heat tokens can't use Impervious. When an opposing character clears action tokens and is not adjacent to Extremis Brute, it may remove 1 Heat token from its character card.

special_powers.name: GIANT CLAWS
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 35 can use the Giant Reach ability.

special_powers.name: A NEED FOR SPEED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 8 squares given a power action to activate Running Shot or Hypersonic Speed are dealt 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: SONIC BOOM
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man Mk 40 a move action and modify his speed value by +3. Iron Man Mk 40 must move along a horizontal or vertical path until he can't move. All other characters occupying squares Iron Man Mk 40 moved through are dealt 1 damage and are given an action token. Characters in squares adjacent to the path are given an action token.

special_powers.name: TRADING PROTECTION FOR MANEUVERABILITY
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 40 can use Toughness and Energy Shield/Deflection. When Iron Man Mk 40 has one action token, he can't be targeted with a close combat attack.

special_powers.name: JUST ANOTHER DAY
special_powers.description: Savin can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: GET TO COVER!
special_powers.description: When a friendly character within 8 squares with the Soldier keyword takes damage from an opposing character, that friendly character can use Stealth until your next turn.

special_powers.name: WANNA BE THE WAR MACHINE?
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn choose one of the following that you did not choose last turn: Energy Explosion, Penetrating/Psychic Blast or Ranged Combat Expert. War Machine can use that power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ADVANCED TARGETING AND SMART ORDINANCE
special_powers.description: War Machine can use the Duo Attack ability. When he does and the attack roll is doubles, damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: TRAJECTORY TRACKING
special_powers.description: War Machine can use Probability Control, but only for his own attack rolls during a ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: I'VE GOT YOUR BACK. NO, I'VE GOT YOUR BACK
special_powers.description: Iron Man and Iron Patriot can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Defend. Iron Man and Iron Patriot can use the Sharpshooter ability and may target non-adjacent characters with a ranged combat attack even when they are adjacent to an opposing character.

special_powers.name: THIS LONE GUNSLINGER ACT IS UNNECESSARY...YOU DON'T HAVE TO DO THIS ALONE!
special_powers.description: When Iron Man and Iron Patriot use Duo attack ability, each attack may use 2 targets instead of 1 target and one of their attacks may be a ranged combat action instead.

special_powers.name: TRYING TO ONE-UP EACH OTHER
special_powers.description: When Iron Man and War Machine use the Duo attack ability, you may give them a ranged combat action instead of the second attack.

special_powers.name: WATCH EACH OTHER'S BACKS
special_powers.description: When Iron Man and War Machine do not have two tokens, Iron Man and War Machine can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: REPULSOR-POWERED ASSAULT ENGAGED!
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 42 can use Running Shot. When he does, his speed value is not halved from Running Shot and he possesses 1 target for this action.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS TARGETING SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 42 can use the Sharpshooter ability.

special_powers.name: BLEEDING EDGE ARMOR DEFENSE SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: When targeted by a ranged combat attack, Iron Man Mk 42 can use Super Senses. When Iron Man Mk 42 is successfully hit by an attack, reduce damage dealt by 3.

special_powers.name: IN THE LINE OF FIRE
special_powers.description: Iron Patriot can use Defend, but only to replace the defense value of adjacent friendly characters with the Celebrity, Politician, or Ruler keyword.

special_powers.name: STARK AUO-REPAIR SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: Iron Patriot can use Regeneration and Toughness.

special_powers.name: HIDING IN PLAIN SIGHT
special_powers.description: Killian can use Stealth. Adjacent friendly characters can use the Sharpshooter ability and ignore hindering terrain for line of fire purposes.

special_powers.name: YOUR TECH IS THE PAST, EXTREMIS IS THE FUTURE
special_powers.description: Killian can use Incapacitate with a range value of 4, but may only target characters with the Armor keyword. Damage dealt to opposing characters with the Armor keyword by friendly characters can't be reduced below 1.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT EXTREMIS ARCHITECT
special_powers.description: Killian can use Leadership and Perplex. Killian can use Enhancement but may only modify the damage value of a lower point character with whom he shares a keyword.

special_powers.name: CAPABLE FIGUREHEAD
special_powers.description: When Mandarin is the highest point figure on your force with the A.I.M. keyword, he can use Leadership and Mind Control.

special_powers.name: FRATERNITY OF TERROR
special_powers.description: Mandarin can use Combat Reflexes. When he is adjacent to a friendly character with the A.I.M. keyword, Mandarin can use Mastermind.

special_powers.name: PUPPETEER OR PUPPET?
special_powers.description: Mandarin can use Perplex and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: JUST ANOTHER DAY...
special_powers.description: Extremis Mercenary can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: POPPING SMOKE
special_powers.description: When Extremis Mercenary has one action token he can use Smoke Cloud as a free action until your next turn.

special_powers.name: EXTREMIS EXPLOSION
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed stop turning the dial. At the beginning of your turn deal Extremis Mercenary 1 unavoidable damage and deal 3 damage to each character and destroy each object, wall, and square of blocking terrain within 5 squares.

special_powers.name: STILL A BIT OF A MAVERICK
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 7 is a wild card. Iron Man Mk 7 can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: MULTI-VECTOR DEFENSE SCREENS
special_powers.description: Iron Man Mk 7 can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Invulnerability.
